name: Hit Car Shooting: Racing Arena
description:
Hit Car Shooting: Racing Arena is explosion filled car racing and shooting game where goal is to race, shoot, and destroy all kinds of rival vehicles while speeding down the highway !
Shoot shoot shoot and Just Shoot creating havoc on highway with your weapon car. Shooting Racing and blowing car is only way to survive.
Features
> A mesmerizing blend of war and race
> Adrenaline Boosters
> Realistic graphics and gameplay
> Engaging, Exciting and interactive simulation
